objects.name: Main Entrance Gate
objects.desc: This is the front entrance of the school it is beside Mcdonalds and the front of PTC Building.

objects.name: CSDL Department
objects.desc: This is the Center for Student Development and Leadership(CSDL). This is the department to go if you need help with financial loans or various school related concerns.

objects.name: FVR Building
objects.desc: This building is named after Fidel V. Ramos Library Building. it features a library at the second floor and a museum in his honor.

objects.name: University Library Building
objects.desc: University Library located in second floor the FVR Building. Students can go here to read books and focus on studying.

objects.name: CMA Building Entrance near Registrar
objects.desc: Building used by College of management and accountancy (CMA) Students. Courses Using this Building are Hospital Management Course, Marketing Management Course, Financial Management Course and Tourism.

objects.name: CMA's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located at the first floor of the CMA Building.

objects.name: CMA Building Entrance Near PHINMA Forest
objects.desc: Building used by College of management and accountancy (CMA) Students. Courses Using this Building are Hospital Management Course, Marketing Management Course, Financial Management Course and Tourism.

objects.name: BASIC ED Building
objects.desc: This building is where senior high school students go to classes, it is also the place to pickup modules for the semester.

objects.name: BASIC ED's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: CCJE Department
objects.desc: This Building is used by the Department of the College of Criminology and Justice Education Students.

objects.name: CCJE's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located on the second floor.

objects.name: Gymnasium
objects.desc: The school gymnasium, where most school events are held such as HK meetings and TES meetings and various events. also used by various departments for physical education etc.

objects.name: Gymnasium's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located on the first floor.

objects.name: Student Plaza Entrance Near CMA Hall
objects.desc: This is the student plaza where you can purchase drinks and food, next to it is the PHINMA Forest.

objects.name: Student Plaza Entrance Near PHINMA Forest
objects.desc: This is the student plaza where you can purchase drinks and food, next to it is the PHINMA Forest.

objects.name: Technical Vocational Building
objects.desc: This is used by the students of Technical Vocational Strand of the Basic ED Department.

objects.name: North Hall Entrance 1
objects.desc: North hall, used by the departments of Engineering, Architecture and Education Course Students.

objects.name: North Hall's Comfort Room 1
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: North Hall Entrance 2
objects.desc: North hall, used by the departments of Engineering, Architecture and Education Course Students.

objects.name: PHINMA Forest
objects.desc: This area is for giving relaxation for everyone whether you need to eat somewhere, or study. it is also used for events.

objects.name: MBA Engineering Building
objects.desc: Engineering Building, where the Engineering Department is Located.

objects.name: MBA Hall Entrance 1
objects.desc: This is where the CEA, CELA Departments are located. the students in their respective departments use this building.

objects.name: MBA Hall's Comfort Room 1
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: MBA Hall Entrance 2
objects.desc: This is where the CEA, CELA Departments are located. the students in their respective departments use this building.

objects.name: MBA Hall Entrance 3
objects.desc: This is where the CEA, CELA Departments are located. the students in their respective departments use this building.

objects.name: University Chapel
objects.desc: You can go here to pray. Located the 3rd floor

objects.name: University Clinic
objects.desc: You can go here if you ever need medical assistance. Located at the first floor.

objects.name: MBA Hall Entrance 4
objects.desc: This is where the CEA, CELA Departments are located. the students in their respective departments use this building.

objects.name: Riverside Building
objects.desc: Building used by Medical Students. it features a food court, and a view on the top floor.

objects.name: Riverside Building's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: Riverside Building's Comfort Room near Parking Lot
objects.desc: Located at the first floor near the parking lot.

objects.name: Riverside Building's Parking Lot Area
objects.desc: Located at the ground floor of the Riverside Building.

objects.name: Riverside Building's Food Plaza
objects.desc: There are many stalls that serve food and drinks here. look at building information for more details.

objects.name: Teller
objects.desc: This is where Students and Visitors can go to ask for information regarding school etc.

objects.name: Finance Purchasing Department
objects.desc: This is where the finance department is located.

objects.name: Atrium
objects.desc: Atrium Features a scenery above the Entrance of the school where you can take pictures.

objects.name: Registrar Office
objects.desc: Registar's office, Located at the ground floor of the FVR Building near to the Teller Building.

objects.name: Pedestrian Entrance/Exit
objects.desc: The exit is located at the back of the school and located aside from a hospital.

objects.name: OP/Marketing Department
objects.desc: This is where the Marketing Department is located.

objects.name: Old Stage
objects.desc: This is our old stage. student use it for practice for their performance tasks, etc.

objects.name: Mc Donald's
objects.desc: Where you can go to eat McDonalds. it is located near the front entrance. there is also an entrance from inside the school.

objects.name: ITS Department Building
objects.desc: This is where the ITS Department is located. You can go here to inquire about any problems with your accounts etc.

objects.name: College of Law Office
objects.desc: This where the College of Law Office is Located. it is near the Library at the second floor.

objects.name: Office of Graduate and Professionals
objects.desc: Located beside the College of Law Office.

objects.name: PEDRO Hub Office
objects.desc: Located on the ground floor of the FVR. Located near the Registrar.

objects.name: PTC Building
objects.desc: Also known as the Practical Teaching Center Building. The IT Department Courses are found here along with the Maclabs and Computer Laboratories.

objects.name: PTC's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located at the 3rd floor of the PTC Building.

objects.name: 4 wheels parking area
objects.desc: Located at the front of the FVR.

objects.name: Motorcycle parking area in front of Basic ED Building
objects.desc: Located in front of the Basic ED Building.

objects.name: Motorcycle parking right side of SP
objects.desc: Located at the right side of the Student Plaza.

objects.name: Motorcycle parking right side of Basic Ed.
objects.desc: Located at the right side of the Basic Education Building.

objects.name: Motorcycle parking right side of CCJE.
objects.desc: Located at the right side of the CCJE Building.

objects.name: Motorcycle parking right side of Gymnasium.
objects.desc: Located at the right side of the Gymnasium.

objects.name: General Services Department(GSD) Office
objects.desc: You can go here to ask for general information etc.

objects.name: Uniform Claiming Area
objects.desc: Located at the first floor of the FVR Building. you can claim the uniforms here.

objects.name: Module Claiming Area
objects.desc: Located at the first floor of the Basic Ed Building. You can claim your modules here for the semester.

objects.name: Phinma Forest Pond
objects.desc: Where you can relax and admire the view of the pond and it's inhabitants.

objects.name: Student Plaza's Food Place
objects.desc: You can go here to get food and drinks.

objects.name: College of Allied Health And Sciences (CAHS) Office
objects.desc: Located at the second floor of the Riverside Building.

objects.name: MBA Hall's Comfort Room 2
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: Phinma Avenue
objects.desc: Located at the middle of the school, in front of the MBA Hall.

objects.name: College of Arts And Sciences (CAS) Office
objects.desc: Located at the 4th floor of the MBA Hall.
